item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
I’d say it’s quite worth it. Crew Expendable and Last Survivor are nice little bits of gameplay content based off the movie. Don’t buy the Season Pass.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: TheKeeper
item.description:
Hey folks, this game is half off on steam right now. Is it worth it? Also are there any of the DLC’s that are good?

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I think I set the FOV to 65 for more situational awareness, which is why the camera has a much wider angle than most people’s experiences with the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
I’m not sure how to change it, though I found it invaluable when I couldn’t find a proper hiding place and needed to peek out between chairs and stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
nah I was already able to see my legs, and I left the FOV on default obviously, changing it doesn’t seem to fix the issue though

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Maybe you set your fov too high. Try lowering it until you see your legs when you look down.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
does anyone know if there’s a fix for the ingame viewcamera origin of rotation?

If you don’t know what I’m talking about, stand next to a railing or something and turn slowly left or right, if you pay attention to the background moving vis-a-vis the railing bars, you will notice that the camera is actually behind the player, as if your eyes were in the back of your head but looking forward. It’s all wrong and it makes me dizzy but I want to play this game.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
Yeah, there is one scripted moment though, it sounded like the alien went off one way and then I did a thing and then stuff happened and then…

Okay basically I nearly died IRL of a heart attack and kind of wish someone had recorded my terrified and totally real “I’m about to be murdered by the evilest thing in the world” scream, for use in other games and movies because it was the most authentic thing ever.

EDIT: LOL I’m in the process of watching your livestream, and I’ve been just crawling out of my skin every time you’ve walked under a ceiling vent and now I’m just at the part where you noticed they were there. I lol’d :lol:

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
That game relies a lot more on atmosphere and suspense rather than cheap scares. The Alien can get the jump on you if you’re not paying attention but that’s all due to the dynamic AI rather than scripted scenes.

The sound design is so good, I tended to rely more on the directional sound effects rather than using the motion tracker.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Part two, and some spare change due to internet problems. I think I’m starting to get used to the oppressive atmosphere on the Sevastapol, but the scares will probably get ramped up soon, right?

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
Awesome! I’ll check it out later tonight when I get to my computer.

EDIT: lol, it’s pretty funny having played through where you are at and having watched the movies, I’m definately looking forward to more.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I’ve started the game. Not much happens in this first bit, I haven’t even seen any enemies yet, but the game’s soundscapes do a lot to put me on edge. More to follow.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: LordSkunk_707
item.description:
Ooh. Never seen any of the Resident Evil films either.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
If you’ve seen any of the Resident Evil films, you know what to expect.

Predators throwing down xenos with fucking WWE stage moves. Literally spinning a mother fucker around by his tail and throwing him in a Hanna Barbara inspired display that would have been redeemable for its comedic value if not completely neutered by being 100% in slow motion.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: LordSkunk_707
item.description:
I never saw AvP. Should I watch it anyway even though it supposedly sucks?

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
AvP was a terrible, terrible thing that should never have

Oh wait, we’ve already covered that.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: M-Man
item.description:
Charles Dance is a hell of an actor that’s for sure. I hope that if they do decide to continue the Alien franchise in the future that they do so under Sigourney Weaver or Ridley Scott’s blessing. James Cameron said he would never come back sadly, since he thought that AvP ruined the franchises’s integrity.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: Dadster
item.description:
After Alien 3 was released, I remember actor Charles S. Dutton (who plays Dillon, leader of the prisoners) stating that a far better movie was made and that it was ruined by decisions made during the movie’s editing process.

The only worthwhile part of the movie was the interaction/relationship between Ripley and the prison’s Dr. Jonathan Clemens, portrayed by actor Charles Dance.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: M-Man
item.description:
(rot)(fodder:

AvP and PARTICULARLY AvP2 were just terrible, terrible things that should never have happened.

Well if you accept Prometheus as canon now AvP doesn’t work as part of the canon. So at least there’s that. I just hope the sequel to Prometheus clears up the first movie…

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: LordSkunk_707
item.description:
Oh yeah, I’ve already forgotten that I can’t jump. Now I just really enjoy it. And the amount of hacking you have to do really isn’t overbearing. A door here, a door there, but they’re not all over the place. I have turning my back to everything to stare at a door though. Tension.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
Alien 3 really fucked over the ending of Aliens. I’d prefer to believe that it never happened.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Isolation
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
Alien3 was enjoyable enough if you decide that it was fan fiction and had absolutely no relevance to the actual aliens universe. Alien Resurrection, uhm, well it was a movie. I guess.

AvP and PARTICULARLY AvP2 were just terrible, terrible things that should never have happened.

Read full topic
